title: Can't log in?
body:
So I've been trying to access league for the past few hours now... I've tried logging in, but it's just stuck at "Logging in...".
I get two error messages after a few minutes saying a report has been sent to Riot?
The NA servers are up, but still can't log in..
Any ideas?

replies.body: Are you on Comcast's network? We're currently tracking a potential login issue with Comcast and are gathering more information. If you are using their network, please let me know.
Im on Comcast and I cant get past the "logging in" screen also.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=y1AwEziV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-11T23:45:32.647+0000)
>
> Are you on Comcast's network? We're currently tracking a potential login issue with Comcast and are gathering more information. If you are using their network, please let me know.

I'm on Comcast, and cannot log in now. Any idea how long until a fix might be in?
If your login issue was directly related to the Comcast routing issue, it should be resolved by now. If you're still having issues logging in, please let me know.

Hey guys, was looking for a post about that topic. I have the same issue ReD3served described, but I am playing from Germany on EUW. I don't find a post on the EUW-Boards. so I post this here. I have done most of the steps to troubleshoot it (just not the Safari setting seated to default, yea I am playing on Mac :D ). I hope you can help me too, got this problem since a few days ( I think 3). My little brother playing over the same Internet connection doesn't have this problem... 

Your Loki
I'm using a comcast network and i'm having terrible in-game lag with chat connection issues so i'm guessing it's a bit more widespread than just login.
